biotools.summary:
A Recurrent Neural Network for Sharp Wave Ripple (SPW-R) Detection.

This repository contains files for RippleNet, a recurrent neural network with LSTM layers for detecting sharp-wave ripples in single-channel LFP signals measured in hippocampus CA1.

bioschemas.name: RippleNet
